statements: UPDATE material_sourcing_info SET supplier_name = 'ABC Supplier', sustainability_rating = 4 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE material_sourcing_info SET supplier_location = 'City A', material_name = 'Material X' WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE material_sourcing_info SET material_name = 'Steel', supplier_location = 'United States' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE material_sourcing_info SET sustainability_rating = 5, supplier_name = 'ABC Supplies' WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE materials SET material_type='Steel' WHERE material_id=1;
UPDATE projects SET project_location='New Location' WHERE project_id=2;
UPDATE materials SET material_name = 'Wood', source_location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE projects SET project_location = 'New York', material_id = 2 WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE material_suppliers SET location = 'New York' WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
UPDATE materials SET price = 1500.50, quantity = 100 WHERE material_id = 123;
UPDATE material_suppliers SET location = 'New Location', certification_status = true WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE materials SET quantity = 100, price = 25.99 WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE materials SET source_location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE material_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE suppliers SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com', contact_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_id = '98765432-1234-4321-abcd-0987654321ef';
UPDATE materials SET material_name = 'Recycled Plastic', is_sustainable = TRUE WHERE material_id = 'f2bd02d7-ebc9-4f5c-a155-3eafc115a79b';
UPDATE material_suppliers SET price = 25.99 WHERE material_id = 'f2bd02d7-ebc9-4f5c-a155-3eafc115a79b' AND supplier_id = 'e594b4e3-abb4-4ff6-b3fd-1975fa3b15d6';
UPDATE materials SET price = 15.99, quantity = 100 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET location = 'New Location', contact = 'newcontact@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE materials SET price = 15.99, quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE material_id = 101
UPDATE projects SET end_date = '2023-06-30', name = 'Project ABC' WHERE project_id = 201
